label: 神人
本: The Moneylenders of Late Medieval Kyoto . University of Hawai'i Press . 2001
説明文: From the thriteenth century, the moneylenders in their guildlike council (Dosō yoriaishū) were affiliated with Enryakuji itself; at the same time they held a subsidiary rank (jinin) in Hie Shrine, to which they paid regular taxes.  [can also be read as jinnin] [土倉寄合]
